derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin chrysal(l)is, chrysal(l)id-, from Greek khrusallis, from khrusos 'gold' (because of the gold colour or metallic sheen of the pupae of some species)

entry.def: A chrysalis is a butterfly or moth in the stage between being a larva and an adult.
A chrysalis is the hard, protective covering that a chrysalis has.

example.tran: 从蛹壳中羽化而出的蝴蝶

means.word_mean: 1. pupa of a moth or butterfly enclosed in a cocoon
